manipulations.insert_object: Insert a large inflatable dinosaur behind the last row of seats, casting a shadow on the wall.
manipulations.remove_object: Remove the popcorn buckets from all the moviegoers' laps, leaving only empty hands.
manipulations.replace_background: Replace the movie screen with a live feed of a tropical beach at sunset, matching the colors.
manipulations.weather_time_change: Add heavy rain streaks on the 'camera' lens, simulating a sudden downpour outside.
manipulations.style_material_change: Change the red movie theater seats to a bright, reflective chrome material with soft reflections.
